Tech Finders is an 11 year old Scottsdale based, boutique style technical recruiting company. We specialize in finding hidden talent in the areas of Technical Management, Software / Web Development, Database Administration, SEO, Data Storage, Network Security, as well as other areas within Information Technology. Additionally, we have a non technical division dedicated to finding professionals in Sales, Marketing, and Call Center Management. We are seeking to form long term relationships with candidates and progressive Arizona companies. Our mission is to be the staffing / recruiting firm of choice due to our integrity, sense of ugency, flexibility, and ability to find the right talent!We were recently named by Ranking Arizona one of the top 10 Technical Placement firms for 2009! SpecialtiesNow hiring experienced Java Test Engineers, Java Developers, IT Sales, Jr PHP Developer, Sr. PHP Developer, Sr. .Net Developer, CRM Developers, Sharepoint Professional, and BizTalk.******************************************************Specialties: .Net Developers, Java Developers, Systems Administrators, Project Managers, Network Engineers, Security Specialists, Tech Support/Help Desk, Web Designers & Developers, Web Developers, SEO, Technical Sales, and IT Management.

VP Human Resources at CalAtlantic Homes
August 12, 2009, Lori was a client of Kristy’s

I have known Kristy Bach for over 12 years. She was one of the first people I met when relocating to Arizona from California. Throughout the years, working for different companies and living through good & bad times in the industry, Kristy has been there with a smile on her face while delivering quality candidates and maintaining a great relationship. I have come to rely on her professionalism and integrity. I know I can count on her to go whatever it takes to find me the right candidate. I have valued both Kristy and my relationship with her throughout the years.

Talent Acquisition Manager/Recruiter
June 25, 2009, Lon was a client of Kristy’s

I have known Kristy for over 15 years and had the pleasure of working with her on several business related projects.  While she was the Vice President of Sales at Talent Tree, she was awarded exclusive partner ship of temporary labor at CSK Auto Inc.  Kristy ensured the most qualified managers were handling our account and the customer service was unbeatable.  Kristy has an eye for detail and addressed any issues immediately.  She is an impressive manager that delivered results in a timely manner.  Kristy has always been reliable and determined to ensure the best customer service was offered.  Her proven track record formed another business relationship at Lakeshore Staffing.  Again, she ensured the best people were in place to adminstrate the CSK account.  One of Kristy's strongest attributes is her relationship building expertise.  Her business decisions are sound and result driven.  I look forward to a continued business relationship with Kristy as she is the person you want on your team when you are looking for talented team members.
